column4: (Reading database ... 60%dpkg: unrecoverable fatal error, aborting: reading files list for package 'libcupsdriver1': Input/output error E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (2)
-- This is the error it gave me when I tried to do sudo apt-get upgrade
Maybe my installs are failing because I need to upgrade from 11.10 to 12.04?
if you want to play with development versions, install it beside your main system
